revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=SparkLAN |model=WLRGFM-100 |fcc_date=06/07/2017 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |type=IoT hub |fcc_id=RYK-WLRGFM100, MXF-WLRGFM100 |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7620A;MEDIATEK, MT7620A, 1641-BMTH, FTPBAW28H; |cpu1_cspeed=580 |fla1=512 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W29N04GVSIAA |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W972GG6JB25I |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, USB 2.0 (Female Micro-B), USB 2.0, |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=2 |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7620A;MEDIATEK, MT7620A, 1641-BMTH, FTPBAW28H; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=Digital Baseband Chip for outdoor LoRaWAN;Semtech;SX1301;SX1301, 1523, 30117.1;1;,,, 137MHz to 1020MHz Low Power Long Range Transceiver;Semtech;SX1276;SX1276, 1612, 70179.1;1;,,, RF I/Q Multi-PHY Mode Transceiver 860-1000MHz;Semtech;SX1257;SX1257, 1516, 25032.,1;2;,,, 380 - 960 MHz Programmable Gain High Efficiency PA;Qorvo;RFPA0133;., PA, 0133, 0SXQ;1; |flags=LoRaWAN, |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid_regex=AP-XXXXXX }} {{TagLine|IOT Femto Gateway}}
This device's FCC entry is a change in ID request from MXF-WLRGFM100 of the [[Gemtek WLRGFM-100]]. Most details are copied from that device.
"ESK-515-0201R", and "WLRGFM-100_V01" are silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
An oversized Mini PCIe card with Semtech components handles LoRaWAN.
